flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 70/100 = <<40*70/100=28>>28 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=80>>80 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 80 x 60/100 = <<80*60/100=48>>48 games.
So, it still needs to win 48 - 28 = <<48-28=20>>20 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - 20 = <<10-20=-10>>-10 games.
#### -10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
